A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually and musically\, this film is fantastic! That's where the good ends. The plotlines are awful\, especially the one concerning Finn and Rose. A middle film in a trilogy should have a good cliffhanger\, but there is none here. Please tell me\, what is there to look forward to in the next movie? Severe lack of character  development is also present in this....and Rian Johnson is going to direct another Star Wars trilogy? No thanks!
